name: Experimental Putting Terminal
description:
Goal

Your goal is get the ball into the hole (Ya it's basically top down mini golf)

Controls

You can rotate the player character (The white circle) using your mouse. Then to shoot your ball just press left click.

Credits

Programming done by - Justin Wells (Reetro)

Music/Audio Made by - Alkaios 

https://soundcloud.com/alkaiosmusic

Art done by - UnofficiallyJam
